title: Locked In Torture
description: This edition is unpublished. A revised edition titled Under By Vengeance is available. Ryan Crichten is a British operative rated for any operation, whatever the risk. But Jenna Tayler’s motives for abducting him are personal. They’re colleagues from different sides of the Atlantic. He saved her life. Yet she’s hell bent on subjecting him to sexual frustration with no chance of relief. And she has an organisation with muscle backing her up. It’s torture his training didn’t prepare him for.
author: Kayla Stonor
